author: IGN
description:
The studio behind the Jackbox Party Pack series, today announced The Jackbox Party Pack 11 and the standalone game, Trivia Murder Party 3, during its first studio Direct. The showcase detailed the five all-new, non-sequel games featured in the upcoming Party Pack and revealed Trivia Murder Party 3's summer camp setting and online features.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Jackbox Games Direct -- Party Pack 11 and Trivia Murder Party 3 Tease

author: IGN
description:
In today's Daily Fix:
The Nintendo Switch 2 has been the talk of the gaming world ever since last week's Nintendo Direct deep dive into the system and its launch line-up. Unfortunately it hasn't all been glowing praise, with many criticizing Nintendo's decison to make Mario Kart World—the Switch 2's headlining launch title—a whopping $80 for the game itself. In an exclusive interview with IGN, Nintendo's Bill Trinen has explained why they think the game is worth the hefty price tag. In related news, it's been revealed that another Switch 2 launch title, Welcome Tour, will cost $10, which doesn't sound so bad at first, but many gamers think the game should have been a pack-in title with the system itself. And finally, in gaming-adjecent news, A Minecraft Movie has already broken box office records by having the biggest domestic opening weekend of any animated movie ever.
title: Nintendo Insists $80 Mario Kart World Price is Justified - IGN Daily Fix

title: We gave HBO's The Last of Us Season 2 a 7 out of 10, which means GOOD. #ign #review #thelastofus

author: IGN
description:
Check out action-packed gameplay from La Quimera in this new trailer for the upcoming narrative driven, sci-fi FPS set in a futuristic Latin American megalopolis. The new La Quimera trailer shows a blend of exosuit abilities, futuristic weaponry, and robotic enemies you'll fight. La Quimera will be available on April 25, 2025 on PC via Steam. La Quimera will have a closed beta for 24 hours starting April 12 at 7 a.m. PT/2 p.m. UTC. Players can request closed beta access on La Quimera’s Steam page, though slots are limited.

#IGN #Gaming
title: La Quimera - Official Gameplay Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Though Den of Wolves borrows quite a bit from Payday and other crime games, the setting, elaborate planning mechanics, and especially its surreal mind-hacking mechanics all made us feel pretty confident that developer 10 chambers’ return to the wonderful world of heisting has a good chance of being another stunning success. Previewed by Travis Northup

#IGN #Gaming
title: Den Of Wolves - The First Preview

author: IGN
description:
Get a look at Project Justice and Plasma Sword: Nightmare of Bilstein in this latest Capcom Fighting Collection 2 trailer for the upcoming fighting game compilation. Capcom Fighting Collection 2, featuring 8 iconic fighting games from across Capcom's history, will be available on Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 4, Xbox One, and Steam on May 16, 2025.

In Project Justice, an intense story unfolds on the high school campus of this 3D fighter. This sequel to Rival Schools ensures justice is served with its 3-on-3 team battle. Devastate opponents with a cooperative Party-Up technique powered by your faith in your friends.

3D fighter Star Gladiator returns for a thrilling, out-of-this-world sequel in Plasma Sword: Nightmare of Bilstein. Battle as a galactic hero wielding a sword powered by plasma. Use character-specific Plasma Fields to briefly overwhelm your opponents, or unleash a Plasma Strike that devastates with a dazzling display. The enthralling story that unfolds in the cutscenes is
title: Capcom Fighting Collection 2 - Official Game Spotlight Trailer

author: IGN
description:
With the full Nintendo Switch 2 reveal well behind us, we looked to our friends at Digital Foundry and gathered up a bunch of news, data, and thoughts to discuss all things tech behind the upcoming console-handheld hybrid. Nvidia's announcement that Nintendo Switch 2 chip will indeed use their flagship DLSS upscaling technology to allow the console to reach new heights not seen in a Nintendo platform before.

#IGN #Gaming #NintendoSwitch2
title: Nintendo Switch 2: How DLSS Will Shape its Future | IGN x Digital Foundry

author: IGN
description:
Watch our spoiler-free The Last of Us Season 2 review by Simon Cardy. The Last of Us S2 premieres on HBO/Max on April 13, 2025.

This IGN TLOU Season 2 review is a spoiler-free review of all seven episodes of the new season of The Last of Us TV show, starring Pedro Pascal as Joel, Bella Ramsey as Ellie, Kaityln Dever as Abby, Isabela Merced as Dina, Young Mazine as Jesse, Ariela Barer as Mel, and Tati Gabrielle as Nora.

What did you think of our The Last of Us S2 review, and are you excited for the new TLOU season based on The Last of Us Part 2? Let us know in the comments!

#TheLastOfUs #TLOU #TV
title: The Last of Us Season 2 Review (Spoiler-Free)

author: IGN
description:
Get ready for high-stakes action with Den of Wolves, in this episode of Beyond Clips, the crew unpacks everything we’ve seen so far. If you love strategic planning, slick visuals, and adrenaline-fueled missions, this is one to watch. 

For more on the PS5 and Den of Wolves make sure to check out IGN's Beyond on IGN.com and youtube.com/igngames

#DenOfWolves #Beyond #Gaming
title: Den of Wolves: Sci-Fi Heists Meets Inception - Beyond Clips

author: IGN
description:
Welcome to IGN’s Rare Loot! We’re on a quest to uncover pop culture's ultimate holy grail collectibles. 

In this episode, we’re hunting for the legendary Dragon Ball Z Time Capsule Trunks. This vehicle playset, manufactured by Irwin Toy in 2001, features launching missiles, a light-up cockpit and includes an exclusive 5-inch action figure of Trunks. 

We also discovered a rare copy of Dragon Ball Z: Super Butōden, one of the first fighting games in the Dragon Ball franchise. Released on the Super Famicom by Bandai in 1993, Super Butōden features characters like Goku, Vegeta, Dr. Gero, Piccolo, Frieza, Android 16, Android 18, Cell, and more. 

Plus, we spotted a rare Irwin Toy Super Size Warriors Vegito from the late '90s. Standing at 16 inches tall, the Super Size Warriors were some of the largest Dragon Ball figures ever produced.

Thanks so much to NHTSA for coming along on this ride, and for reminding us about the dangers of driving distracted.  Collecting can be a fun hobby, but
title: We Found a RARE Dragon Ball Z Figure! - IGN Rare Loot

author: IGN
description:
Check out the new Marvel Studios' Thunderbolts teaser trailer for another look at this upcoming MCU movie starring Florence Pugh, Sebastian Stan, Wyatt Russell, Olga Kurylenko, Lewis Pullman, Geraldine Viswanathan, Chris Bauer, Wendell Pierce, with David Harbour, with Hannah John-Kamen, and Julia Louis-Dreyfus.

In Thunderbolts, Marvel Studios assembles an unconventional team of antiheroes—Yelena Belova, Bucky Barnes, Red Guardian, Ghost, Taskmaster and John Walker. After finding themselves ensnared in a death trap set by Valentina Allegra de Fontaine, these disillusioned castoffs must embark on a dangerous mission that will force them to confront the darkest corners of their pasts. Will this dysfunctional group tear themselves apart, or find redemption and unite as something much more before it’s too late?

Jake Schreier directs Thunderbolts and Kevin Feige is the producer. Louis D’Esposito, Brian Chapek and Jason Tamez serve as executive producers. The screenplay was written by Eri
title: Thunderbolts - Official Teaser Trailer #2 (2025) Florence Pugh, Sebastian Stan, David Harbour

author: IGN
description:
Watch the Mission: Impossible - The Final Reckoning trailer! Our lives are the sum of our choices. Check out the new Mission: Impossible - The Final Reckoning trailer for this upcoming film starring Tom Cruise as Ethan Hunt, Hayley Atwell, Ving Rhames, Simon Pegg, Esai Morales, Pom Klementieff, Henry Czerny, Mariela Garriga, Holt McCallany, Janet McTeer, Nick Offerman, Hannah Waddingham, Tramell Tillman, Shea Whigham, Greg Tarzan Davis, Charles Parnell, Mark Gatiss, Rolf Saxon, Lucy Tulugarjuk and Angela Bassett.

Mission: Impossible - The Final Reckoning is produced by Tom Cruise and Christopher McQuarrie. David Ellison, Dana Goldberg, Don Granger, and Chris Brock serve as executive producers. Based on the television series by Bruce Geller. It is written by Christopher McQuarrie & Erik Jendresen.

Mission: Impossible - The Final Reckoning, directed by Christopher McQuarrie, opens in theaters on May 23, 2025.

#MissionImpossible #Movies #IGN
title: Mission: Impossible - The Final Reckoning - Official Trailer (2025) Tom Cruise, Hayley Atwell
